name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Joseph Daniel MILLER, Petitioner

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 32 day of May, 2000, the Motion for Stay and Application for Leave to File Post-Submission Communication are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
751 A.2d 647
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Joseph Daniel MILLER, Petitioner.
